programme.title: Saturday Kitchen Live
programme.desc: Matt Tebbutt is joined by chefs Poppy O'Toole and Bryn Williams, plus special guest Alesha Dixon. Helen McGinn picks the wines to go with the studio dishes

programme.title: Nadiya's Everyday Baking
programme.desc: Nadiya Hussain provides the inspiration to bring the joy of baking into everyday lives, and celebrates bakers across Britain, shining a light on their favourite bakes. She begins with treats for an easy Afternoon Tea, from striped meringue lollipops to coffee cake with dalgona coffee cream and dreamy butterscotch cheesecake bars, and meets Mina Said-Allsopp, who shares her secrets to a gluten-free chocolate sourdough

programme.title: Football Focus
programme.desc: Alex Scott and guests look ahead to the weekend's fixtures, including Liverpool v Manchester United. Plus, news from the lunchtime game between Manchester City and Newcastle United

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin helps a couple from London with a £550,000 budget to make a rural move to Wiltshire, and joins a group of bicycling enthusiasts on a ride through Longleat Estate

programme.title: Live Athletics
programme.desc: Gabby Logan presents live coverage of the second session on day three from Atakoy Arena in Istanbul, Turkey. The women's pole vault final gets under way and the men's heptathlon continues with the high jump. The women's 800m semi-finals also take place, with Great Britain's Keely Hodgkinson the reigning champion. With analysis by Jessica Ennis-Hill and Denise Lewis, and commentary from Steve Cram and Andrew Cotter

programme.title: Celebrity Bridge of Lies
programme.desc: Ross Kemp hosts the game show, which sees former England rugby star Ugo Monye, tennis player Judy Murray, goalkeeper David James and Scottish footballer Pat Nevin taking it in turns to cross the floor by only stepping on the correct answers - and doing their best to avoid the wrong ones. programme.title: Newsround
programme.desc: The war in Ukraine is the biggest in Europe since World War II. Millions of children have been forced to leave their homes to escape the fighting, but many either others couldn’t or didn’t. Hearing from just some of those who are living through war, this film lets the children caught in the conflict tell their stories in their own words. Covering fear, loss, strength and hope, they detail the life-changing events of the war and the impact it is having on their day-to-day life. They share their experiences of surviving attacks from the air, being forced to live for weeks at a time in bomb shelters, and their towns and villages becoming occupied by Russian soldiers. Ricky Boleto finds out how the children are coping with living in a country at war.

programme.desc: Iagan MacNeil finds out about the landscape and history along the St Cuthbert's Way, starting off at Melrose Abbey, where he talks to Iain Craig of Historic Environment Scotland. The 62-mile long pilgrims' route - named after the seventh-century hermit, healer and bishop St Cuthbert - links Melrose Abbey in the Scottish Borders where Cuthbert began his religious life, with his original burial place on the Holy Island of Lindisfarne off the Northumbrian coast

programme.desc: A personal portrait of a South Uist crofting township where the Greylag geese outnumber people by three to one. Over the last 30 years, the resident population of Greylags has increased from less than 1,000 to over 9,000 birds. With little to check the breeding Greylag, the geese are destroying the cultivation of Uist corn

programme.desc: Peter forms a neighbourhood-watch group, but is arrested and charged with a hate crime after shooting an intruder climbing into Cleveland's house

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian and Bonnie run away together after declaring their love for each other - with Joe vowing revenge on the hound. Meanwhile, Chris and Meg are caught stealing from the residents of a retirement community

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Steve uncovers a conspiracy dating back to the Civil War while researching a paper on George Washington Carver for Black History Month. programme.title: Superstore
programme.desc: Amy loses face in front of the district manager, so Johan and Glenn help her hatch a plan to look like a tough boss. Meanwhile, Dina and Mateo run the store's shoplifter rehabilitation programme

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: Stan gets a new uniform and is proud to wear it - until he sits on a freshly painted chair. Classic comedy, starring Reg Varney

programme.title: On the Buses (1971)
programme.desc: Wily bus driver Stan Butler thinks a new company policy that allows women behind the wheel will rob him of his precious overtime money. Enlisting the aid of conductor Jack, he does everything he can to sabotage the plan. Comedy, based on the TV series, starring Reg Varney, Bob Grant, Stephen Lewis, Doris Hare, Peter Madden and Anna Karen

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The amateur sleuths are called to a monastery to restore a herb garden in time for a royal visit - but their pruning and planting is disrupted by the discovery of a corpse. As they investigate the death, the tight-knit community closes in around them. Mystery drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The duo help reorganise the seed museum owned by the descendants of famous botanist Edwin Pargeter - but it is not long before a man is found dead in the family's garden. In an effort to trace his killer, Rosemary involves colleagues from the Royal Horticultural Society at Kew Gardens, and soon the race is on to identify a batch of mysterious seeds before it falls into the wrong hands. Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris star

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A petty thief is impaled with a pitchfork in sleepy Midsomer Mallow, jeopardising the residents' chances of winning a 'perfect village' competition. To make matters worse, two of the judges are also killed. Guest starring Timothy West and Hannah Gordon, along with an early appearance by a young Orlando Bloom as the first victim

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A commercial decision to turn Midsomer Deverell's memorial garden into a tea shop proves fatal for members of the Inkpen family. DCI Barnaby's investigation unearths more than mere local hostility as he lifts the lid on long-buried secrets. Anna Calder-Marshall and Margaret Tyzack guest star

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A horse whisperer disappears in Newton Magna, bringing Barnaby face to face with long-standing adversary Melvyn Stockard. The former convict's social climbing has paid dividends, sending him straight to the top of the village pecking order - and some believe his driving ambition makes him capable of foul play. Murder mystery, guest starring Larry Lamb (EastEnders, Gavin & Stacey), with John Nettles and Daniel Casey

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A prominent resident is robbed and battered to death with her walking stick, and suspicion soon falls on the members of her reading club - which turns out to be a front for a lucrative investment portfolio. John Nettles and Daniel Casey star, with guest appearances by Anton Rodgers (Fresh Fields) and Angela Thorne (To the Manor Born)

programme.title: Live Darts: UK Open
programme.desc: Jacqui Oatley presents coverage of the evening session on day two from Butlin's Minehead, where the tournament nicknamed the 'FA Cup of Darts' continues with matches in the last 16. Eventual champion Danny Noppert comfortably overcame Dirk van Duijvenbode 10-2 in an all-Dutch clash at this stage of last year's tournament, while Peter Wright suffered a shock 10-3 defeat at the hands of William O'Connor. With analysis from Chris Mason, Alan Warriner-Little, Mark Webster and Ned Boulting, and commentary by Stuart Pyke and John Rawling

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Oxford's last-surviving all-female college is holding a reunion to bid farewell to one of its most prominent professors. However, the evening leads to tragedy when a guest is found murdered, and Lewis is convinced the killing is connected to an attack that occurred at the same institution 10 years previously. The detective calls in his former DS, Alison McLennan, to help with the investigation, but the case takes a twist when two more bodies turn up. Crime drama, guest starring Juliet Stevenson and Saskia Reeves, with Kevin Whately and Laurence Fox

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Pauline grows increasingly frustrated with her role at the surgery and starts to interfere with Martin's work, much to the GP's annoyance. Comedy drama series, starring Martin Clunes

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Bert comes to the conclusion that a new challenge will help him move on from Al's departure and decides to open a restaurant, but a spate of food-poisoning cases coincides with his first day of business. Martin meets Poppy, the surgery's new receptionist, and Pauline returns from her course. Comedy drama, starring Ian McNeice and Martin Clunes

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: First episode of the costume drama set in an Edwardian country house in 1912, written by Oscar-winning writer Julian Fellowes. The lives of the Crawley family and Downton Abbey's servants are changed for ever when the sinking of the Titanic leaves the estate without its heir and his son. The arrival of a new valet shocks the staff, who scheme to make his stay as short-lived as possible. Starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Everyone is anxious at the arrival of Matthew Crawley, the heir presumptive, but he soon encounters problems settling into his new life in Downton, and his mother Isobel immediately crosses swords with Violet. Meanwhile, butler Carson is mortified to be confronted with his past, and housemaid Gwen seems to have a secret correspondent. Costume drama, starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville, Dan Stevens, Penelope Wilton, Elizabeth McGovern, Jim Carter and Rose Leslie

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Cora's attempts at matchmaking are dashed when Mary is smitten not by intended target Evelyn Napier, but by his handsome friend, Turkish attache Kemal Pamuk. The couple's mutual attraction sparks a train of events whose consequences ripple through the entire household. Gwen is humiliated as her secret ambition is exposed, and Bates takes extreme action to cure his limp. Costume drama, starring Maggie Smith, Michelle Dockery, Brendan Patricks, Theo James, Rose Leslie and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The fair arrives in the village and Mrs Hughes finds herself the centre of speculation when she meets a former suitor who makes her question her position at Downton. Meanwhile, Violet and Isobel lock horns over a medical ailment affecting Molesley, and Carson fears there is a thief at work in the grounds. Costume drama, starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville, Phyllis Logan, Penelope Wilton, Jim Carter and Kevin Doyle

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: As the village prepares for the annual flower show, Isobel finds herself in conflict with Violet, and Mary is introduced to a potential suitor, but it would seem she only has eyes for Matthew. Anna realises who is to blame when a valuable snuff box goes missing, and Mrs Patmore tearfully reveals her fears to Carson that her career may be coming to an end. Meanwhile, O'Brien engineers a way for Edith to take revenge on Mary. Drama, starring Maggie Smith and Robert Bathurst

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The duo are invited to help create an Arabian-style garden in Malaga. Before long, a local resident is found dead, and a mysterious landowner is the chief suspect. When it transpires that someone has blocked the mountainside channels on which the new garden will rely for its supply of water, it appears the precious commodity may provide a motive for the killing. Mystery drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: Laura and Rosemary are hired to re-create a Victorian garden in Regent's Park, where they meet all manner of intriguing characters - but the oasis of calm in central London is shattered by the discovery of a body. The victim is a respected Harley Street psychiatrist - whose three-legged dog appears to hold the key to solving the case. Mystery drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell help more people reunite with long-lost relatives. Phyllis and Kevin Haran fought in vain to get their son back through the courts after putting him up for adoption when they were homeless, jobless and desperate to put their baby's interests first. The other story follows 64-year-old Michael O'Neil in his search for his birth mother

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Home Sweet Home - Travels in My Own Land
programme.desc: Starting in the Outer Hebrides, Joanna explores the Harris tweed industry, and drives a herd of Highland cattle across the sands at low tide to their winter grazing. Next she heads to Eilean Donan Castle, the location for her first episode of The New Avengers. Crossing to Northern Ireland, Joanna visits the Dark Hedges, made famous in Game of Thrones, before having a laugh with one of the Derry Girls. She then meets the inspiring founder of the Children in Crossfire charity

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: DCI Barnaby launches a murder investigation when the severed hand of a missing hotel manager is found by a dog. The dead man had recently been named in the will of the hotel owner, and solving the case takes on a renewed sense of urgency when fatal accidents start happening to the other beneficiaries. Mystery, guest starring Rosemary Leach and Samantha Bond, with John Nettles and Daniel Casey

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Lady Southwold, Lady Marjorie's widowed mother, and her companion Miss Hodges arrive, throwing the household into turmoil. Later, the staff below stairs are dismayed to hear that a brooch has apparently been stolen

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Elizabeth joins the suffragette movement and plans a raid on a local MP's house, but it is Rose who is arrested during the ensuing scuffle and sent to Holloway Prison

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: Jack asks Arthur's sister out to the Boxing Day social - much to her brother's displeasure. Vintage comedy, starring Reg Varney

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: As Anna agonises about breaking the news of her pregnancy to Simon, a glamorous woman stirs up trouble between them. Meanwhile, Stephen and Jacqui prepare to leave Skelthwaite to start their new life in Glasgow, but Vic is subdued by the prospect of losing his son, daughter-in-law and grandson, and Henry realises he's got a fight on his hands if he wants to win back Jess from Hussan

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Chris is bowled over by new nurse Beth and wastes little time trying to woo her, while Anna is annoyed that the whole village appears to know about her pregnancy, except the one person who really matters. Henry nurses a broken heart and confronts his love rival after one too many in the pub, and David's taxi-driving job takes its toll _ resulting in a horrific accident. Drama, starring Leslie Ash and Philip Middlemiss

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: After enjoying a trip to the theatre with Captain Hastings, the detective is disturbed by the sound of gunshots in an apartment at Whitehaven Mansions, and soon finds himself investigating a murder. Drama, starring David Suchet, Hugh Fraser and Philip Jackson

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A special constable mysteriously disappears after a row with pig farmer Betty Sutch. His uniform is discovered in the pig sty and macabre rumours begin to circulate the village that implicate his wife. Meanwhile, Greengrass benefits from a cleaner house when he puts up an old friend. Nick Berry and Bill Maynard star

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Andy hits on the idea that he could run Butler's Farm himself. Marlon stands up to Shadrach, and the villagers hatch a plan to coax Edna out of her exile

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Andy makes a bargain with Chris over the future of Butler's Farm. Zoe tells Chloe about the new woman in her life. Marlon receives some bad news

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Fred refuses to heed Audrey's advice about Lillian, Eileen gives Jason an ultimatum and the Peacocks are stunned to find Maxine's mum waiting on their doorstep

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Vera confronts Lillian after Jack loses his job at the Rovers. Norris returns home to find Richard standing over Emily with a bottle of painkillers

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The bell-ringers of Midsomer Wellow are mysteriously murdered one by one - and it seems an ancient rhyme may hold the key to the killer's motive. As Barnaby and Troy embark on a baffling investigation in an attempt to determine the truth, Joyce starts digging into the past to discover the assassin's motives. John Nettles, Daniel Casey and Hugh Bonneville star

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Sybil's determination to pursue her political leanings lands her in great danger when a fight breaks out at an election results meeting. Matthew's tenderness in caring for the would-be suffragette is noticed by her sisters, but it is Mary who is stunned to receive a marriage proposal. Bates is cleared of suspicion over the stolen wine, but offers his resignation rather than name the culprit. Drama, starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: An Aidensfield housewife is found dead and suspicion falls on her schoolboy son, who promptly makes matters worse for himself by disappearing. Jo moves in to Maggie's house. Nick Berry stars

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: An American female bishop visiting St Gerard's College is found dead after drinking poisoned wine, and when another two killings occur, both mirroring macabre murders from Jacobean revenge tragedy, it appears the culprit is targeting candidates in the election to become vice-regent. However, when Innocent learns one of the suspects is hiding a dark secret, Lewis and Hathaway realise the motive is much more twisted. Guest starring Sian Phillips and Ronald Pickup, with Kevin Whately and Laurence Fox

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: When a woman is found dead laid out in the shape of a crucifix on Jesus Green, Will and Geordie are led to a nearby convent where they meet steely Sister Grace, who rules over her flock with an iron fist. Even more sinister is the picture that starts to emerge as they match the nuns to a series of unsolved missing persons cases from the previous five years. Meanwhile, when Leonard's father, Russell, arrives in Grantchester, it's clear there's no love lost between parent and son. Robson Green, Tom Brittney, Tracy-Ann Oberman and Sean Gilder star

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: It's 1958 in Grantchester, and the vicarage family and the Keatings are on a much-needed summer break at Merries Holiday Camp - only for it to turn into something of a busman's holiday for Will and Geordie, when the camp's owner Roy Reeves is found dead in suspicious circumstances. Between unhappily married guests, frustrated entertainment staff and Roy's put-upon wife, Will and Geordie discover almost everyone had a grudge against Roy. Behind the smiles and jolly holiday façade of Merries lays a much less wholesome reality

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A petty thief is impaled with a pitchfork in sleepy Midsomer Mallow, jeopardising the residents' chances of winning a 'perfect village' competition. To make matters worse, two of the judges are also killed. Guest starring Timothy West and Hannah Gordon, along with an early appearance by a young Orlando Bloom as the first victim

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A commercial decision to turn Midsomer Deverell's memorial garden into a tea shop proves fatal for members of the Inkpen family. DCI Barnaby's investigation unearths more than mere local hostility as he lifts the lid on long-buried secrets. Anna Calder-Marshall and Margaret Tyzack guest star

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A horse whisperer disappears in Newton Magna, bringing Barnaby face to face with long-standing adversary Melvyn Stockard. The former convict's social climbing has paid dividends, sending him straight to the top of the village pecking order - and some believe his driving ambition makes him capable of foul play. Murder mystery, guest starring Larry Lamb (EastEnders, Gavin & Stacey), with John Nettles and Daniel Casey

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A prominent resident is robbed and battered to death with her walking stick, and suspicion soon falls on the members of her reading club - which turns out to be a front for a lucrative investment portfolio. John Nettles and Daniel Casey star, with guest appearances by Anton Rodgers (Fresh Fields) and Angela Thorne (To the Manor Born)

programme.title: Live Darts: UK Open
programme.desc: Jacqui Oatley presents coverage of the evening session on day two from Butlin's Minehead, where the tournament nicknamed the 'FA Cup of Darts' continues with matches in the last 16. Eventual champion Danny Noppert comfortably overcame Dirk van Duijvenbode 10-2 in an all-Dutch clash at this stage of last year's tournament, while Peter Wright suffered a shock 10-3 defeat at the hands of William O'Connor. With analysis from Chris Mason, Alan Warriner-Little, Mark Webster and Ned Boulting, and commentary by Stuart Pyke and John Rawling

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Oxford's last-surviving all-female college is holding a reunion to bid farewell to one of its most prominent professors. However, the evening leads to tragedy when a guest is found murdered, and Lewis is convinced the killing is connected to an attack that occurred at the same institution 10 years previously. The detective calls in his former DS, Alison McLennan, to help with the investigation, but the case takes a twist when two more bodies turn up. Crime drama, guest starring Juliet Stevenson and Saskia Reeves, with Kevin Whately and Laurence Fox

Comedy drama series, starring Martin Clunes

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Bert comes to the conclusion that a new challenge will help him move on from Al's departure and decides to open a restaurant, but a spate of food-poisoning cases coincides with his first day of business. Martin meets Poppy, the surgery's new receptionist, and Pauline returns from her course. Comedy drama, starring Ian McNeice and Martin Clunes

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: First episode of the costume drama set in an Edwardian country house in 1912, written by Oscar-winning writer Julian Fellowes. The lives of the Crawley family and Downton Abbey's servants are changed for ever when the sinking of the Titanic leaves the estate without its heir and his son. The arrival of a new valet shocks the staff, who scheme to make his stay as short-lived as possible. Starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Everyone is anxious at the arrival of Matthew Crawley, the heir presumptive, but he soon encounters problems settling into his new life in Downton, and his mother Isobel immediately crosses swords with Violet. Meanwhile, butler Carson is mortified to be confronted with his past, and housemaid Gwen seems to have a secret correspondent. Costume drama, starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville, Dan Stevens, Penelope Wilton, Elizabeth McGovern, Jim Carter and Rose Leslie

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Cora's attempts at matchmaking are dashed when Mary is smitten not by intended target Evelyn Napier, but by his handsome friend, Turkish attache Kemal Pamuk. The couple's mutual attraction sparks a train of events whose consequences ripple through the entire household. Gwen is humiliated as her secret ambition is exposed, and Bates takes extreme action to cure his limp. Costume drama, starring Maggie Smith, Michelle Dockery, Brendan Patricks, Theo James, Rose Leslie and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The fair arrives in the village and Mrs Hughes finds herself the centre of speculation when she meets a former suitor who makes her question her position at Downton. Meanwhile, Violet and Isobel lock horns over a medical ailment affecting Molesley, and Carson fears there is a thief at work in the grounds. Costume drama, starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville, Phyllis Logan, Penelope Wilton, Jim Carter and Kevin Doyle

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: As the village prepares for the annual flower show, Isobel finds herself in conflict with Violet, and Mary is introduced to a potential suitor, but it would seem she only has eyes for Matthew. Anna realises who is to blame when a valuable snuff box goes missing, and Mrs Patmore tearfully reveals her fears to Carson that her career may be coming to an end. Meanwhile, O'Brien engineers a way for Edith to take revenge on Mary. Drama, starring Maggie Smith and Robert Bathurst

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The duo are invited to help create an Arabian-style garden in Malaga. Before long, a local resident is found dead, and a mysterious landowner is the chief suspect. When it transpires that someone has blocked the mountainside channels on which the new garden will rely for its supply of water, it appears the precious commodity may provide a motive for the killing. Mystery drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: Laura and Rosemary are hired to re-create a Victorian garden in Regent's Park, where they meet all manner of intriguing characters - but the oasis of calm in central London is shattered by the discovery of a body. The victim is a respected Harley Street psychiatrist - whose three-legged dog appears to hold the key to solving the case. Mystery drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell help more people reunite with long-lost relatives. Phyllis and Kevin Haran fought in vain to get their son back through the courts after putting him up for adoption when they were homeless, jobless and desperate to put their baby's interests first. The other story follows 64-year-old Michael O'Neil in his search for his birth mother

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Home Sweet Home - Travels in My Own Land
programme.desc: Starting in the Outer Hebrides, Joanna explores the Harris tweed industry, and drives a herd of Highland cattle across the sands at low tide to their winter grazing. Next she heads to Eilean Donan Castle, the location for her first episode of The New Avengers. Crossing to Northern Ireland, Joanna visits the Dark Hedges, made famous in Game of Thrones, before having a laugh with one of the Derry Girls. She then meets the inspiring founder of the Children in Crossfire charity

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: DCI Barnaby launches a murder investigation when the severed hand of a missing hotel manager is found by a dog. The dead man had recently been named in the will of the hotel owner, and solving the case takes on a renewed sense of urgency when fatal accidents start happening to the other beneficiaries. Mystery, guest starring Rosemary Leach and Samantha Bond, with John Nettles and Daniel Casey

programme.desc: Andy hits on the idea that he could run Butler's Farm himself. Marlon stands up to Shadrach, and the villagers hatch a plan to coax Edna out of her exile

Matthew's tenderness in caring for the would-be suffragette is noticed by her sisters, but it is Mary who is stunned to receive a marriage proposal. Bates is cleared of suspicion over the stolen wine, but offers his resignation rather than name the culprit. Drama, starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.desc: An Aidensfield housewife is found dead and suspicion falls on her schoolboy son, who promptly makes matters worse for himself by disappearing. Jo moves in to Maggie's house. Nick Berry stars

Guest starring Sian Phillips and Ronald Pickup, with Kevin Whately and Laurence Fox

programme.desc: When a woman is found dead laid out in the shape of a crucifix on Jesus Green, Will and Geordie are led to a nearby convent where they meet steely Sister Grace, who rules over her flock with an iron fist. Even more sinister is the picture that starts to emerge as they match the nuns to a series of unsolved missing persons cases from the previous five years. Meanwhile, when Leonard's father, Russell, arrives in Grantchester, it's clear there's no love lost between parent and son. Robson Green, Tom Brittney, Tracy-Ann Oberman and Sean Gilder star

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: It's 1958 in Grantchester, and the vicarage family and the Keatings are on a much-needed summer break at Merries Holiday Camp - only for it to turn into something of a busman's holiday for Will and Geordie, when the camp's owner Roy Reeves is found dead in suspicious circumstances. Between unhappily married guests, frustrated entertainment staff and Roy's put-upon wife, Will and Geordie discover almost everyone had a grudge against Roy. Behind the smiles and jolly holiday façade of Merries lays a much less wholesome reality

He wants to become invisible, but when his best friend Lenny gets chosen instead, Mo will have to get his friend out of this terrible situation.

programme.title: Smarty Pants
programme.desc: Animated comedy series about three kids and their missions from the Great Book of Cooldom. He's so strong, so buff, and he's got so many super-cool tattoos - there's no-one like Jason Tattoo! The friends totally need tattoos to be fly, but it's not so easy to get one when you're ten years old, though!

programme.title: Smarty Pants
programme.desc: Animated comedy series about three kids and their missions from the Great Book of Cooldom. Zoe reveals her list of the funniest boys she knows, but what a disappointment it turns out to be for our heroes - they're not even mentioned! The trio, who consider themselves to be super hilarious, try to convince Zoe of their comic potential, and they even ask for tips from the funniest man in town, who just so happens to be Pedro's grandpa!

programme.title: Smarty Pants
programme.desc: Animated comedy series about three kids and their missions from the Great Book of Cooldom. PJ, Issa and Pedro can't believe their eyes when they find out that the newest hip accessory is a crocodile tooth - being hip is expensive, though, and our pals don't have the cash they need, especially since Issa is saving up to buy a collectible action figure! Simone offers them a space at her booth at the neighbourhood flea market, but what should they do with the money that they earn from it?

programme.title: Smarty Pants
programme.desc: Animated comedy series about three kids and their missions from the Great Book of Cooldom. When Issa's grandpa tells him that three guys instantly became the coolest people on the planet by going to the Moon in 1969, the three friends love the idea and decide to do the same! It's not easy, though, and they realise quite quickly that they don't know a lot about rocket science, but even if they can't really go to the Moon, nothing's stopping them from making a video that says that they did...

programme.title: Smarty Pants
programme.desc: Animated comedy series about three kids and their missions from the Great Book of Cooldom. It's a golden opportunity to get a selfie with the star, and they'll have bragging rights for ages - the friends therefore decide to participate in the event, even if their musical talents are less than extraordinary...

Ted's keen to make a big impression on his first day of high school, believing he's done just that when he completes an initiation on the school bus by mooning a nearby car, but there's a problem - the driver of the car is deputy head Mr Rodman! Ted, Jai and Cody must now break into that same car to retrieve the incriminating evidence from the dash cam - meanwhile, Jada is busy trying to join an exclusive study group.

programme.title: Ted's Top Ten
programme.desc: Comedy series following the misadventures of Ted and his friends and family. Only Cody makes it through, however, and fearing he may have lost Cody to a cult, Ted has to dig deep to get his friend back - meanwhile, Jada loses her place on the basketball team in favour of her clumsy friend Leah.

programme.desc: Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer are joined by guests Danny Jones, Spencer Matthews, Amy-Leigh Hickman and Lucy Porter. Samara Joy performs live in the studio

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Career aptitude tests have an unexpected effect on the Simpson kids, prompting Lisa to fall in with a bad crowd while perennial troublemaker Bart finds a new respect for law and order

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Convinced the family no longer loves him, a dejected Santa's Little Helper decides to run away from home, and has the misfortune to be adopted by Mr Burns - who brainwashes him into becoming a vicious attack dog

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer goes to a Country and Western bar after a row with Marge, and vows to make the venue's singing waitress a star. As he throws himself into the role of manager, he realises he has to choose between his new career and his loyalty to his family. Featuring the voice of Beverly D'Angelo

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: Compilation of highlights from previous episodes. An orangutan has to be separated from his mother for the first time when she undergoes a CT scan to check for a life-threatening infection. The zoo's cardinal fish undergo a breeding programme, but one struggles to protect his offspring from his circling, cannibalistic neighbours

programme.title: Matt Baker: Our Farm in the Dales
programme.desc: The male lambs need to be separated from the females. Molly and Nicola help Janice to bring some freshly laid eggs to the barn, where they'll need to be incubated before hatching into the next generation of rare-breed chickens. The final stages of the hay harvest begin, and Matt surprises his dad Mike with a trip to the restoration garage to see what he's been up to with his 1946 Dodge

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer search Bristol with Josh and Anna, who are buying their first home together, and Sue and Samira, who are moving from London to a city they barely know for a change of pace in their life. However, one couple have a budget that falls short of their requirements, while the other pair appear to lack confidence when it comes to making a decision

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud visits a couple planning to build a home that looks like a work of art overlooking a valley in south Devon. Joe and Claire's new home will be a giant sculpture inspired by the local landscape, 70 metres long and featuring 34 enormous angled zinc shards jutting out in all directions. It will also be complicated to build and equally as expensive. And although Joe is wealthy, ambitious and fearless, his team quickly come up against problems and the budget virtually doubles the first walls go up. Is his dream home in danger of become a nightmare?

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: The Andrew Neil Show
programme.desc: Boris Johnson's government at the time of the pandemic is once again under scrutiny following a raft of WhatsApp messages raising questions about decision-making on matters of national interest. Former Justice Secretary Robert Buckland discusses the matter with former Chancellor George Osborne and former Shadow Chancellor Ed Balls. And with Labour under pressure over the appointment of former civil servant Sue Gray to chief of staff, Shadow Work and Pensions Secretary Jonathan Ashworth will be in the studio

programme.title: World's Most Secret Hotels
programme.desc: The final episode uncovers hidden retreats in Canada, Iceland, Sweden and the UK - from underwater sunken hotels to remote retreats surrounded by lava fields

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down
programme.desc: It's the semi-final and the potters are making pieces for the bathroom before taking on the iconic Moorcroft tube lining in the surprise second challenge. Judges Keith Brymer Jones and Rich Miller have a tough choice deciding who will go through to the following week's grand finale

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: Steve Jones presents action from the opening round of the season, held at Bahrain International Circuit in Sakhir. There was a Ferrari one-two here last year, with Charles Leclerc finishing ahead of Carlos Sainz Jr. Red Bull's Max Verstappen got his title-defence off to a disappointing start when he failed to finish the race, but he eventually went on to retain the championship. With analysis from David Coulthard and Mark Webber

programme.title: All the Money in the World (2017)
programme.desc: When 16-year-old John Paul Getty III is kidnapped in 1973, his devoted mother tries to convince his billionaire grandfather Jean Paul Getty to pay the ransom. Ridley Scott's fact-based drama, starring Michelle Williams, an Oscar-nominated Christopher Plummer, who replaced Kevin Spacey a few weeks before the film was released, and Mark Wahlberg

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Denver, Colorado, where he meets the stubborn owner of Italian restaurant Pantaleone's, who appears to be firmly stuck in the past. Pete maintains he makes the best pizza in town - based on a review from the 1980s - but the fiery chef's own taste test proves the opposite. With Pete's wife Paulette and son Josh threatening to leave, can Gordon get through to him and save the business?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: This competition takes place in and around Liverpool, where the first to host is 41-year-old taxi business owner Rob, who plans a Scouse themed evening. programme.desc: Tommy sits in on a class and discovers Dick is not a very good teacher, while Sally decides Don is destined for greatness - and resolves to help him achieve it. Comedy, starring John Lithgow, Jane Curtin, Kristen Johnston and French Stewart

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: A slice of wedding cake triggers off memories of Carrie's uneasiness prior to her big day and a desperate search for reassurance from God about her marriage to Doug. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Leah Remini

programme.desc: Diane visits Seattle for the opening night of her new play, which turns out to be a mixed blessing for Frasier. Although hurt over being jilted, he still harbours feelings for her - but they disappear once he attends the dress rehearsal. Shelley Long guest stars

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: A shady character helps the Crane brothers get Maris out of a spot of legal trouble - then demands they return the favour by persuading his girlfriend to marry him. Comedy, guest starring Harris Yulin, with Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

They need a garden that's secure enough for their four dogs to roam safely, and the property must be big enough to host their six grown-up children and three grandchildren. Ben Hillman lines up some impressive properties for their budget of £150,000

programme.desc: Catching up with a father and daughter horse riding duo in Italy, who need to think on their feet if they are to survive another hot Italian summer. Marc and Natalia's paddleboarding business in Spain branches out into new territory, and on the Costa Blanca, Dan, Rik and Rex have their dreams of owning a gin distillery dashed

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition begins at Cedarwood Holidays in St Keverne, Cornwall, where married couple Kirstie and Joe hope their glamping experience will leave the B&Bers green with envy. The guests are pleased with their pristine pods, and the chance to feed seals at a local wildlife sanctuary goes down a treat

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The first of five dinner parties from Leeds. Dog lover Jill is hoping her simple vegan menu will fare well with her guests

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family wins a once-in-a-lifetime safari trip to Africa. However, when Homer enrages a hippo at a Masai party, the jaunt soon becomes an adventure, involving a trip over the Victoria Falls in a ceremonial shield, a carnivorous plant, coconut Molotov cocktails and a chimp refuge that's not all that it seems

programme.title: Hollyoaks

programme.title: Channel 4 News

programme.title: Jamie's £1 Wonders
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver presents recipes that keep costs under control in the kitchen. In the first episode, he shares a roast chicken recipe that saves both time and money by filling chicken thighs with a super-simple stuffing to make the meat stretch further. Plus, a pancake batter-based dish with layers of spinach, ham and cheese and a pizza that doesn't even need you to turn on the oven

programme.title: George Michael: Outed
programme.desc: Part one of two. How the singer's outing was a landmark moment in gay politics, with a potential career-ending scandal being averted by seizing control of the media narrative. The first episode looks back at the singer's early career, and unearths the reasons he felt compelled to remain in the closet in the first place. Featuring contributions from former manager Simon Napier-Bell and Rev Richard Coles, who recalls his own experiences of being a gay man and a pop star in the 1980s

programme.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
programme.desc: Alice travels from London to Washington, DC meeting people who are entering relationships with multiple partners in a bid for more sex and a deeper connection, including a 20-person polycule - a group of open-minded lovers who have created an ever-evolving support system through their intertwined sex lives. Back in the British suburbs, she meet a young married couple whose dalliances with other couples has helped strengthen their relationship

programme.title: Send Nudes: Body SOS
programme.desc: Vogue Williams meets glamour model Maddison, who believes bigger breasts will help her stand out, and film graduate Tom, whose current penis size is knocking his confidence. But as they both confront their life-size naked avatars, will they decide to push ahead with their plans for surgery or will their minds be changed by what they see in front of them and hear from our feedback panel?

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on Bad Sisters, Nadiya's Everyday Baking, The Kardashians, Super/Natural, Emma Willis: Delivering Babies, and A Trip to Infinity, as well as BBC News reports on the energy cap and a U-turn by Kwasi Kwarteng. First broadcast in October 2022

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Arvada, Colorado, where a husband and wife have allowed their restaurant to fall into disrepair. Randy's hoarding is out of control, while Alexa, who runs the kitchen, has a lot to learn. To make matters worse, the Old Neighborhood is one of the filthiest eateries the fiery chef has ever seen, and only one of the biggest transformations of the series can save the business

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud meets Audrey and Jeff Lovelock, who dream of living in one of west London's most exclusive areas. However, the only way they can afford it is to go underground. Their plan is to transform a listed Edwardian artist's studio - along with 5,000 square feet of derelict basement - into a bespoke subterranean home, complete with supersize kitchen, mezzanine sitting room, four en-suite bedrooms, a gym, cinema, steam room and wine cellar. As if the task was not tricky enough, they are doing it without proper architects' drawings and Audrey is project managing - and the difficulties begin almost from the start

programme.title: Extraordinary Escapes with Sandi Toksvig
programme.desc: In Devon, Sandi is joined by comedian Sarah Millican to explore a Scandi-inspired architectural retreat ingeniously built into a hillside and tucked away in a small wood. In Lee Bay on the north coast, the pair stay in a 16th-century mill house dramatically positioned on the water's edge that is full of both history and surprises. Their final stop is Crowness Cleave where they enjoy a private spa retreat before experiencing the ultimate form of relaxation - a gong bath

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House, New Home
programme.desc: The architect explores an arts and crafts-inspired house in Surrey. Built in the 1920s, it has tall chimneys, leaded windows, gabled ends and a steeply pitched roof. Sadly, it has Artex everywhere and incorporates some dubious design alterations. He sets out to help its owners turn it back into an elegant home for themselves and their three children. George also tackles a suburban home that has so many layers of wallpaper that peeling them back is like going back through a time warp

programme.title: Hijacked
programme.desc: In June 1985, TWA flight 847 made a routine stop-off in Athens, Greece. Its destination was Rome, but that changed after armed Lebanese militia boarded the plane. Against the backdrop of the Middle East conflict, the terrorists had one objective in mind - the release of hundreds of Islamic prisoners detained in Israel. Seizing the US airliner shortly after take-off, the passengers and crew - including singer Demis Roussos - endured a three-day ordeal involving a stream of landings across various airports. This documentary recalls their experiences

programme.title: Hijacked

When an attempt to take over a plane that had just left Amsterdam was foiled, the group responded by seizing control of three more aircraft and diverting them to the Jordanian desert, while a fourth was blown up on the runway at Cairo. Comedy, starring Bill Murray, Andie MacDowell, Chris Elliott and Stephen Tobolowsky

A chimpanzee used in the tests develops superior intelligence and becomes outraged at the human race's cruel treatment of his kind, forming his fellow primates into an army to overthrow mankind. Sci-fi thriller, starring James Franco, Freida Pinto and Andy Serkis

programme.title: Dinosaur with Stephen Fry
programme.desc: Stephen Fry heads 66 million years into the past to the fateful last days of the dinosaurs to see how the plant-eaters fought back against deadly predators, and witnesses how a light in the sky became an extraordinary extra-terrestrial threat that signalled the end of the dinosaur's reign on earth

programme.title: 22 Kids & Counting
programme.desc: The Radfords mark 30 happy years of marriage with a very special - and eventful - road trip down memory lane, visiting the people and places that have shaped and affected them the most. Sue is surprised by her bridesmaids at the church she and Noel got married in, and is reminded of the fact that nobody thought the marriage would last, while Noel is made to relive his drunken antics at the reception. They also revisit the site of their first business, which nearly ended their marriage and left them bankrupt

programme.title: The Great Fog of 1952
programme.desc: Dr Xand Van Tulleken and Raksha Dave investigate the smog that affected London in 1952, which is one of the deadliest environmental disasters ever recorded and one of the world's worst peacetime catastrophes. Lasting just over four days, the Great Smog plunged London into a terrifyingly murky gloom - the acrid pollution seeping into homes, leaving Londoners gasping for breath, shutting down transport and emergency services, and overwhelming hospitals and undertakers alike

programme.title: Britain's Favourite 80s Hits
programme.desc: A look at some of the most popular songs of the 1980s, an era when Wham!, Frankie Goes to Hollywood and Kylie made their debuts. It was also a time when Band Aid attempted to Feed the World, and Stock Aitken and Waterman-related acts dominated the charts. The Human League, Culture Club, Duran Duran, and Adam and the Ants also enjoyed plenty of Top 40 success

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Documentary showing how CCTV and other technological advances are helping to bring car thieves to justice. Suspected criminals in Chester are involved in a high-speed chase through the city centre, and there is footage that helped put an end to one of London's most prolific gangs. The programme also includes film of a getaway in which robbers tried to evade the law by driving at 180mph

programme.title: The LeoVegas Live Casino Show

programme.title: Hijacked
programme.desc: The documentary series turns attention to events in London in April, 1980, when six armed men from Iran seized control of the capital's Iranian embassy. Holding 26 people at gunpoint, the terrorists demanded the immediate release of political prisoners incarcerated in their homeland, and safe passage from the UK. If these demands were not met, the men claimed they would shoot all 26 of their hostages. Forty years later, first-hand accounts from some of the hostages, interviews with John Dellow of the Metropolitan Police and Gen Michael Rose of the SAS, and recorded footage from the incident are all brought together to provide an insight into the six-day ordeal that ended in a dramatic rescue operation

programme.title: Hijacked

programme.desc: The return of the documentary following the work of medical emergency teams in the A&E department of Barnsley Hospital. Sister Vicky has the job of keeping patients and staff cool on the hottest day of the year, and while an emergency delivery of ice pops provides temporary relief, the heat is taking its toll on the hospital generator. Fifty-year-old Michael is brought in after collapsing at home and his family are worried he has had a seizure, but Dr Blanchard has another theory after examining his blood tests

programme.desc: The lives of baby animals as they grow up, from birth through to their first critical months, including three-week-old rhino Granville, who is just starting to meet the other residents of a safari park. In one of Britain's biggest seal colonies on the remote Norfolk coast, newborn grey seal pups must learn to feed from their mothers - but one mother refuses her pup, and he has to chase her around the beach for vital nourishment

programme.title: Wonderful World of Baby Animals
programme.desc: Alligator babies call to each other as they break out of their eggs, while young gorilla Louango is eager to escape its mother and go climbing. programme.desc: A tough female pirate enlists the help of an educated slave in finding the three parts of a map leading to buried treasure. However, one of the pieces is in the hands of her cruel uncle, and she also has to find the loot before her crew mutinies or the British Navy catches up with her. Swashbuckling adventure, starring Geena Davis, Matthew Modine, Frank Langella and Maury Chaykin

programme.title: The Martian (2015)
programme.desc: A manned mission to Mars is abruptly abandoned, with one crew member left for dead. However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last the crew a month. Ridley Scott's sci-fi drama based on the novel by Andy Weir, starring Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: The Banshees of Inisherin Interview Special
programme.desc: The In Bruges team of Colin Farrell, Brendan Gleeson and writer/director Martin McDonagh talk about making their new film together, The Banshees of Inisherin

programme.title: Born on the Fourth of July (1989)
programme.desc: Oliver Stone's fact-based drama chronicles the life of Ron Kovic, an eager-to-impress, patriotic Marine Corps recruit, who endures terrifying experiences during the Vietnam conflict that leave him paralysed from the chest down. On his return home, he undergoes a harrowing journey of physical and mental recovery that leads him to question the whole purpose of the war. Starring Tom Cruise, Willem Dafoe, Kyra Sedgwick and Josh Evans

programme.title: The Shallows (2016)
programme.desc: A surfer strays into the hunting territory of a great white shark, and finds herself stranded on a tiny island a mere 200 yards from the shore. With the deadly aquatic predator between her and the beach and her safe haven slowly disappearing as the tide comes in, she faces a life or death struggle to get safely back to dry land. Thriller, starring Blake Lively and Oscar Jaenada

programme.title: The Beach Bum (2019)
programme.desc: Moondog is a slacker who lives a nomadic, hedonistic lifestyle around the Florida Keys, while working on his new book. The wedding of his daughter Heather leads to no end of problems. Writer/director Harmony Korine's comedy, starring Matthew McConaughey, Isla Fisher, Snoop Dogg, Zac Efron and Jonah Hill

programme.title: Earth vs the Flying Saucers (1956)
programme.desc: Aliens arrive on Earth with an ultimatum - surrender or face death - prompting humanity to pull out all the stops to find a way of defeating the extraterrestrial menace. Sci-fi drama, starring Hugh Marlowe, Joan Taylor, Donald Curtis and Morris Ankrum, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen

programme.title: The Banshees of Inisherin Interview Special
programme.desc: The In Bruges team of Colin Farrell, Brendan Gleeson and writer/director Martin McDonagh talk about making their new film together, The Banshees of Inisherin

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon (2010)
programme.desc: A clumsy Viking boy longs to become a mighty dragon slayer and protect his village from the fearsome flying lizards, but his father thinks he is not up to the task. However, when he sets out to prove his worth, he ends up befriending a dragon, and realises his people may have misjudged the creatures. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Jay Baruchel and Gerard Butler

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2 (2011)
programme.desc: Martial arts master panda Po continues to hone his skills when an evil peacock, who was banished from China for trying to build a deadly new weapon, returns to cause more chaos. It falls to Po to defeat him, but he suffers strange flashbacks revealing a connection between his past and the sinister bird. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black and Gary Oldman

programme.title: A Room with a View (1985)
programme.desc: A naive woman accompanies an older cousin on a trip to Florence, where she falls in love with a forward-thinking man. She is forced to cut short the romance and return to a loveless engagement in England, where the object of her affection makes an unexpected appearance. Period drama from James Ivory, based on EM Forster's novel and starring Helena Bonham Carter, Maggie Smith, Denholm Elliott, Daniel Day-Lewis, Julian Sands and Judi Dench

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada (2006)
programme.desc: A woman with dreams of becoming a journalist takes a job as assistant to the editor of a prestigious fashion magazine - a position that should guarantee a bright future if she succeeds. Unfortunately, she has just signed up to work for the boss from hell, whose cruel personality and outrageous demands make her life a nightmare. Comedy drama, with Meryl Streep, Anne Hathaway, Stanley Tucci and Emily Blunt

programme.title: Bombshell (2019)
programme.desc: Drama telling the real-life story of three women who anchored Fox News, one of America's most powerful news networks, but became the headlines themselves when they risked everything to stand up to Roger Ailes, the man who made them famous. Starring Charlize Theron, Nicole Kidman and Margot Robbie

programme.title: The Crying Game (1992)
programme.desc: An IRA member holds a British soldier hostage. The pair form an unlikely bond - so when the situation ends in tragedy, the guilt-ridden terrorist sets out to find his former prisoner's lover. But romance is soon on the cards, with devastating results. Neil Jordan's thriller, starring Stephen Rea, Jaye Davidson and Miranda Richardson

programme.title: The Dead Center (2018)
programme.desc: A hospital psychiatrist's own sanity is pushed to the edge when a frightened amnesiac patient insists that he has died and brought something terrible back from the other side. Horror, starring Shane Carruth, Poorna Jagannathan and Jeremy Childs

programme.title: The War Lover (1962)
programme.desc: Bomber commander Buzz Rickson is respected by his crew for his daredevil abilities in the air, but his personal life is a disaster. His co-pilot initially idolises the fearless airman, but over time becomes increasingly aware of his hero's flaws - especially when Rickson starts pursuing his comrade's girlfriend. Second World War drama, with Steve McQueen, Robert Wagner and Shirley Anne Field

programme.title: Crack in the World (1965)
programme.desc: A dying scientist and his colleagues conduct experiments to harness the Earth's inner energy that seem set to end in disaster. Sci-fi thriller, with Dana Andrews, Janette Scott, Kieron Moore and Alexander Knox

programme.title: The Duel at Silver Creek (1952)
programme.desc: A gambler goes after the gang of claim jumpers who killed his father, and joins forces with an injured marshal who also wants the criminals brought to justice. However, their partnership is tested when a devious femme fatale enters their lives. Don Siegel's Western, starring Audie Murphy, Stephen McNally and Faith Domergue

programme.title: Strategic Air Command (1955)
programme.desc: A pilot relishes the opportunity to return to the baseball pitch once the Second World War is over. However, his sporting career is put on hold when he's drafted back into the US Air Force and given the opportunity to fly a revolutionary new jet. Drama, starring James Stewart, Frank Lovejoy, Barry Sullivan, Alex Nicol and June Allyson

programme.title: Suffragette (2015)
programme.desc: A woman joins a campaign to gain the right to vote in 1912. She and her allies find their peaceful protests accomplishing little in the face of an unwavering state, so resort to increasingly violent measures, risking everything they have in the pursuit of political justice. Period drama, starring Carey Mulligan, Helena Bonham Carter, Anne-Marie Duff and Meryl Streep

programme.title: The Godfather (1972)
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppola's gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton

programme.title: Parasite (2019)
programme.desc: A family living in poverty and getting by through an assortment of scams hatch a plan to infiltrate a wealthy household. They trick their way into assorted domestic staff jobs - ruthlessly ousting the established servants and devising ways of making their naive but self-centred employers' luxurious home their own. Oscar-winning South Korean satirical thriller, starring Kang-ho Song and Sun-kyun Lee. In Korean and English

programme.title: Supernanny US
programme.desc: Jo Frost comes to the rescue of Upstate New York couple Ian and Jamie Orr, whose children's problems range from picky eating to playing violent video games that lead to nightmares

programme.title: Lego Masters Australia

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Brick Hotel in Newtown, Pennsylvania, where the staff have had enough of owner Verindar, who runs the establishment like an angry tyrant. Can Gordon convince her to value her loyal workers and entice customers back to this landmark hotel?

programme.title: Bee Movie (2007)
programme.desc: A bee wearies of a life dedicated to producing honey and decides to leave his hive. During his foray into the wider world, he befriends a florist. However, when he realises what becomes of the honey his species toils so hard to make, he resolves to sue the entire human race for stealing from his fellow creatures. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jerry Seinfeld, Renee Zellweger and Chris Rock

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay discovers Gloria has planned a romantic getaway to Hawaii for his birthday, but his excitement fades when he realises the rest of the clan will be joining them. Starring Ed O'Neill and Sofia Vergara

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil tries to be romantic when the family goes on holiday to Hawaii, and Jay realises it will not be as relaxing as he had hoped. Elsewhere, Mitch and Cam cannot decide whether to go sightseeing, and the children run riot. Comedy, starring Ty Burrell and Ed O'Neill

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire's plans for a family portrait do not go smoothly, and Cameron reveals his inner diva. Comedy, starring Julie Bowen and Eric Stonestreet

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire finally gets Phil to agree to sell their old car, Mitchell decides to build a large princess castle for Lily, and Manny invites a girl over for a study date - which makes Gloria uncomfortable. American comedy following the lives of three dysfunctional households - a man who struggles to keep up with his younger wife, an embarrassing husband and a gay couple getting used to parenthood after adopting a Vietnamese baby. Starring Julie Bowen and Ty Burrell

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire finds herself becoming an overbearing mother when she finds out that Alex has a crush on a boy, and Haley's idea of sisterly advice is not helping matters. Meanwhile, Mitchell and Cameron have an argument over the former's aversion to public displays of affection, and Gloria believes that her grandmother has been visiting in her dreams. Comedy, starring Ed O'Neill

programme.title: Playing with Fire (2019)
programme.desc: A straight-laced fire superintendent and his elite team of expert firefighters come to the rescue of three siblings in the path of an encroaching wildfire, but quickly realise that no amount of training could prepare them for their most challenging job yet - as their babysitters. Comedy, starring John Cena, Keegan-Michael Key and John Leguizamo

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard returns from his research expedition in the North Sea and undergoes an adjustment period with Sheldon. Howard experiences an unusual emotional reaction as a result of his relationship with his mother. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Simon Helberg star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends compete in a scavenger hunt designed by Raj to test their scientific knowledge and life skills, but the game brings out the best and worst in everyone. As the hunt progresses, Howard and Amy begin to bond over their shared musical tastes, while Penny and Sheldon work together as a team and Bernadette becomes fiercely competitive

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon introduces Amy to Raiders of the Lost Ark - one of his favourite films - and is distraught when she ends up pointing out a plot hole that ruins the whole story. Meanwhile, Leonard realises he can manipulate Penny into feeling sorry for him when his mother publishes a reveal-all book about his childhood problems. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Johnny Galecki

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon re-evaluates the time he spends with Amy when she takes a job at the university. Meanwhile, Howard is forced to sleep on his friend's sofa after he gets into an argument with Bernadette. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Simon Helberg and Mayim Bialik

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon stumbles upon a major scientific breakthrough, causing him to feel like a fraud, while Penny steps up her game with Leonard after seeing Howard make a romantic gesture to Bernadette. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is hurt when Professor Proton (Bob Newark) contacts Leonard for help, so he befriends TV scientist Bill Nye, and Raj gets jealous when Howard crashes a girls' night in making home-made jewellery. Starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki, and Kunal Nayyar

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard becomes concerned that Sheldon will overreact when his friend learns the truth about a past indiscretion, while Penny confronts Raj's old flame Lucy about the way she ended their relationship. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones goes in search of the legendary Ark of the Covenant, a biblical artefact of devastating power. His quest leads him to Egypt, where the Nazis are plotting to use the Ark to further Hitler's plans for world domination - aided by Jones's deceitful French rival. The first of five big-screen action adventures, starring Harrison Ford as Indy, with Karen Allen, Paul Freeman and John Rhys-Davies

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: A rolling cast of famous faces critiques shows including The Masked Dancer, Dirty Dancing, Best of Top Gear, Naked Attraction, Tom Allen's Quizness, Ramsay's 24 Hours to Hell and Back, and The Bad Skin Clinic. programme.title: Gogglebox

programme.title: Gogglebox

Plus, BBC news coverage of Boris Johnson's road map announcement concerning reducing the restrictions of lockdown

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: An international DJ who has learned some new things about her sexuality after a recent holiday to Ibiza now has to get to grips with London's same-sex dating scene - which is not easy when her first date is someone she previously blanked on a dating app. A man with deteriorating vision and a desire to start a family is paired with a trombone player, while other candidates include a full-time carer and a medical student looking to date outside her profession

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Those taking part include 23-year-old Rory, who meets 24-year-old Ella, along with 54-year-old self-confessed man-eater Caroline, who has been on 50 dates in the past two years. Tattoo enthusiast Adam returns to First Dates hoping to romance 30-year-old single mum Laura, who is yet to meet a man who accepts she has a child. Urologist Abi may know all about the male anatomy, but realises her job can scare off some men

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox

Gordon confronts owner Brent's inappropriate and miserly behaviour, but is it enough to repair the establishment's reputation?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy has a date with a mystery man, so Sheldon asks Howard and Raj to help him find a new girlfriend online. When Amy is coy with the details about the guy she's dating, Penny and Bernadette decide to spy on them. Stephen Merchant guest stars

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy try hanging out as friends when they spend Thanksgiving together at the aquarium. Howard reluctantly agrees to volunteer at a soup kitchen with Bernadette, Raj and Emily. Meanwhile, Penny discovers that Leonard knows more about her than she thought

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Felix fights for his youth club venue, Donna-Marie lets loose at singles' night, Warren has a big proposition for Mercedes, and Tony has a heart-breaking confession to make

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos, featuring a breakdancing fail and a man kissing a crocodile

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits the Beachfront Inn and Inlet, a Caribbean-style resort hotel in Fort Pierce, Florida. Young and inexperienced owner Brian is making guests' time at the hotel miserable with dusty rooms, late-night concerts and poor service. Can Gordon prevent the business from going under?

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay travels to Loudonville, Ohio, to rescue Landoll's Mohican Castle, a custom-built, multimillion-dollar hotel set in an 1100-acre woodland estate. Co-owner Marta is struggling, having been left with the entire burden of running such a large establishment alone. Can Gordon persuade her son Jimmy to finally take the reins and turn this business around before the family legacy is destroyed?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The fiery chef comes to the aid of a French restaurant in the heart of Moorpark, California. The pompous, over-complicated cuisine is keeping the customers away and there is an imminent threat of bankruptcy. However, the owner is vigorously opposed to change, despite the failings of his current business model

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay comes to the aid of Lela's, a Pomona, California, restaurant that is currently being run into the ground by its inexperienced owner. Gordon tries to turn the failing business around, but faces opposition from the chef and makes enemies when he exposes the suspect behaviour of some members of staff

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny struggles with Leonard's confession that he kissed another woman when he was away on his North Sea research expedition. After driving all the way to Las Vegas, she must now decide whether she wants to go through with the wedding. Back home, Sheldon doesn't know how to act after Amy tells him she wants them to take a relationship break

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard meets up with the woman he kissed during his trip in the hope of setting Penny's mind at ease, while Sheldon films a special episode of Fun with Flags after his break-up with Amy. Bernadette feels guilty about keeping a secret from Penny

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny and Leonard announce that they are moving in together, prompting Sheldon to revisit 2003, a much simpler time before he had met either of them. Howard and Raj form a band to play at the comic-book store, only to fall out over musical differences

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: In the middle of a nationwide shortage of liquid helium, Sheldon and Leonard take desperate measures to obtain the supplies they need in order to prove a scientific theory before a rival team of researchers can beat them to it. Meanwhile, Penny and Bernadette download a dating app onto Amy's phone in order to find her a new boyfriend

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is dismayed when the group spends the Thanksgiving holiday at Mrs Wolowitz's house, but hits it off with Bernadette's father. Meanwhile, Penny realises she must deal with a mistake from her past when she and Leonard have an argument. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is bothered by the attention he receives in the wake of his heavy element discovery, but is taken aback when his work is disproved by Leonard. Meanwhile, Raj makes Howard and Bernadette feel inadequate when he stays with them for a week and is the perfect house guest

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon leaves for Texas when his sister goes into labour. While he is away, the rest of the friends decorate for Christmas and reflect on how much he has changed their lives. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Lego Masters Australia
programme.desc: The teams have six hours to create builds that can drag themselves across a high wire for at least 10 metres, then are given 10 hours to complete unfinished cities

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist, with his young sidekick and a nightclub singer in tow, is stranded in India, where he takes on a mission to recover magical sacred stones from the hands of an evil cult engaged in human sacrifice and child slavery. Steven Spielberg's action adventure, starring Harrison Ford, Kate Capshaw, Ke Huy Quan and Amrish Puri

programme.desc: Ali Davis is a successful sports agent who is constantly overlooked by her male colleagues. Then everything changes when she gains the ability to hear men's thoughts. Director Adam Shankman's revamp of Mel Gibson's romantic comedy What Women Want, starring Taraji P Henson and Aldis Hodge

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Two more singletons choose a date from a selection of six naked people, who will be revealed to them one body part at a time. First up is 24-year-old Rebecca, a singer from Nottinghamshire who is tired of always having her heart broken by guys with a bad boy image and wants to see if choosing a date in the studio can help her pick a better mate. Next up is 25-year-old development manager Dan from Durham, who has unsuccessfully tried countless dating apps and hopes to find Mr Right

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon presses Leonard and Penny to choose a date for their wedding, while he also has to deal with dramatic changes in his own relationship with Amy. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj is worried that people won't take him seriously in his own field after publishing a paper that suggests he may have discovered alien life. Penny encourages Leonard to stand up for himself when he aims to become the principal investigator on a plasma physics study

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

Howard is surprised but happy to learn that Bernadette wasn't the only waitress at The Cheesecake Factory who had a crush on him back in the day

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Assisted by Geoff, Erica and Valley Erica find a new band member to replace Lainey, but Barry convinces Geoff that the new musician is trying to steal Erica from him. Adam and Murray each plot to get out of going to Valentine's Day dinner with Beverly

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Felix fights for his youth club venue, Donna-Marie lets loose at singles' night, Warren has a big proposition for Mercedes, and Tony has a heart-breaking confession to make

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: The McQueens come up with creative ways to make money. Later, Rayne is forced to make a confession, and Sienna and Grace clash

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Mercedes accidently reveals the truth to the wrong person, and Diane's concern for Tony grows as he swaps sleep for productivity

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three restaurants he helped that were among the biggest challenges he faced, finding out whether they stayed on the road to recovery or turned back into nightmares. First he meets sisters Rita and Lisa to see if they have continued serving fresh instead of frozen food at Boston's La Galleria 33, before heading to the Olde Hitching Post in Hanson, Massachusetts, to discover whether controlling owner Tom has kept his promise and handed over the reins to his daughter Andrea. Finally, Gordon goes back to the Prohibition gastro pub in Everett, Washington, to catch up with owner Rishi and learn if she has ditched belly-dancing in favour of running her business

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay uses his wealth of experience in the restaurant business to help struggling hotels, motels and B&Bs across America. After identifying the most pressing issues at each location, he puts the owners and staff to work as he attempts to save their establishments from disaster. His first stop is Coeur d'Alene, Idaho, where the Roosevelt Inn is more than $1million in debt - and to make matters worse, the owner's wife has had enough

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Despite Beverly's wishes, Jackie's parents allow Adam to watch horror movie A Nightmare on Elm Street, and a family disagreement ensues. Meanwhile, Erica starts hanging out at her old high school and soon realises she's not as popular as she once was

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Murray is angered when he finds out that Adam has no interest in auditioning for a school stage production. Meanwhile, Beverly interferes with Erica's latest career plan

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard questions his engineering abilities when he and Sheldon can't get a toy drone to fly. programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: There is a clash of personalities when Sheldon and Leonard's mothers finally meet, while Howard finally decides to do his fair share of the housework - but not without a little help from his friends. Guest starring Christine Baranski and Laurie Metcalf

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: As Howard and his fellow astronauts sit in the space shuttle awaiting launch, he reflects on the tumultuous events of the previous few days, when he and Bernadette tried to get married. Meanwhile, his friends witness the blast-off on TV at home

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

Their only option is to hold the ceremony at home - but then Sal, who supposed to be marrying them, is forced to leave. Will they ever get to say 'I do'? Elizabeth Banks guest stars

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: As the wedding of Gina's mother and Boyle's father arrives, each member of the squad is given a task to complete for the big day. However, Peralta and Santiago get sidetracked chasing a criminal, and Jeffords struggles to officiate at the ceremony. Comedy, guest starring Sandra Bernhard and Nick Cannon

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The squad springs into action when Jake and Amy's wedding is jeopardised by a major threat. Holt is reluctant to open the email saying whether he has been appointed Commissioner

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

Penny's family arrives in town to attend Penny and Leonard's second wedding ceremony. Keith Carradine, Laurie Metcalf, Christine Baranski and Judd Hirsch guest star

Comedy adapted from the 1994 film, starring Nikesh Patel, Nathalie Emmanuel, Rebecca Rittenhouse, Brandon Mychal Smith and John Reynolds
